ISLAMABAD , May 19 ( Reuters ) - A Pakistani court on Monday dropped a case against a U.S. law enforcement agent charged with weapons offenses for trying to board a flight while carrying bullets and a knife in his luggage .
The incident revived memories of Pakistan 's 2011 arrest of a CIA contractor , who shot dead two men he thought were trying to rob him , souring U.S .
